page.title: 10A CHILDS DAY
page.content: On Tuesday 25th June I woke up at 0750. I had cornflakes and a slice of toast for breakfast and then came to school in the car with my friend Richard. At school we made arrangments for sports day. I am in the sack race. Later we rehearsed our service for our class assembly on Friday. After school I went in the car to the stables where I keep my pony . When I got there I groomed my pony 'Magic' and then I had a riding lesson. Then we went home and I had my dinner, after which I watched tv for an hour or so then went to bed.
